Header: 2030 million rupees to provide drought relief
Content: Minister Duminda Dissanayake announces that the government has set aside 2030 million rupees to provide immediate relief to the people who have been affected by the ongoing drought. The Minister was speaking at a media briefing. He pointed out that 451,000 families in the country have been caught up with the dry weather situation.Â  Each family will be provided a bag of essential items worth 5,000 rupees. The program to distribute relief items will commence next week.
